metadata.description: Sample resume data for testing and development
metadata.author: Resumate Team

sample_resumes.name: John Doe
sample_resumes.title: Senior Software Engineer
sample_resumes.summary: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years of expertise in full-stack development, specializing in Laravel and React applications.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ users
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed RESTful APIs using Laravel and Node.js
Optimized database queries improving performance by 40%
Collaborated with design team to implement responsive UI

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

sample_resumes.name: Jane Smith
sample_resumes.title: UX/UI Designer
sample_resumes.summary: Creative UX/UI designer with 4+ years of experience creating user-centered designs for web and mobile applications.

experience.title: Senior UX Designer
responsibilities: Led UX design for SaaS platform used by 500+ companies
Conducted user research and usability testing
Created design systems and component libraries

education.degree: Master of Fine Arts in Design

strengths: Strong technical background with quantifiable achievements
Clear career progression with increasing responsibilities
Good use of action verbs and metrics
improvements: Add more industry-specific keywords for ATS optimization
Add LinkedIn profile and portfolio links
ai_analysis_samples.structure_feedback: Well-organized layout with clear section headings and consistent formatting throughout.
ai_analysis_samples.content_feedback: Excellent use of quantifiable achievements and relevant technical skills for software engineering role.

modern.description: Clean, contemporary design with subtle colors and modern typography

minimal.description: Simple, elegant design focusing on content clarity

chronological.description: Traditional format emphasizing work experience timeline
